mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DQZJXZW`, t1.`GW`, t1.`NL`, t1.`NLDQ`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PCMRZGLID`, t1.`PCMRZGLNAME`, t1.`RZNX`, t1.`RZNX_COLOR`, t1.`SEX`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGID`, t1.`YGNAME`, t1.`ZJ`, t1.`ZJNX`, t1.`ZJNX_COLOR`, t1.`ZJRQ`, t1.`ZWRQ` FROM `T_PCMRZGL` t1 ) t1 where pcmrzglid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DQZJXZW`, t1.`GW`, t1.`NL`, t1.`NLDQ`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PCMRZGLID`, t1.`PCMRZGLNAME`, t1.`RZNX`, t1.`RZNX_COLOR`, t1.`SEX`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGID`, t1.`YGNAME`, t1.`ZJ`, t1.`ZJNX`, t1.`ZJNX_COLOR`, t1.`ZJRQ`, t1.`ZWRQ` FROM `T_PCMRZGL` t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DQZJXZW, t1.GW, t1.NL, t1.NLDQ, t1.ORGID, t1.ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.PCMRZGLID, t1.PCMRZGLNAME, t1.RZNX, t1.RZNX_COLOR, t1.SEX, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.YGBH, t1.YGID, t1.YGNAME, t1.ZJ, t1.ZJNX, t1.ZJNX_COLOR, t1.ZJRQ, t1.ZWRQ FROM T_PCMRZGL t1

SELECT T1.*,(T1.txnx - T1.nl) as nldq,T2.ORMRANKNAME,t2.JYJLNX as zjjlnx,t3.nx as zwjlnx,t3.bxjlnx as zwbxjlnx ,(case when t2.JYJLNX< t1.zjnx then '20' else '10' END) as zjnx_color, (case when t3.bxjlnx< t1.rznx then '20' when t3.nx< t1.rznx then '30' else '10' END) as rznx_color FROM T_PCMRZGL3 t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t2 on T1.zj = T2.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t3 on t1.dqzjxzw = t3.ormdutyid

SELECT T1.*,(T1.txnx - T1.nl) as nldq,T2.ORMRANKNAME,t2.JYJLNX as zjjlnx,t3.nx as zwjlnx,t3.bxjlnx as zwbxjlnx ,(case when t2.JYJLNX< t1.zjnx then '20' else '10' END) as zjnx_color, (case when t3.bxjlnx< t1.rznx then '20' when t3.nx< t1.rznx then '30' else '10' END) as rznx_color FROM (SELECT t1.pimpersonid AS pcmrzglid, t1.pimpersonname AS pcmrzglname, t1.pimpersonid AS ygid, t1.pimpersonname AS ygname, t1.ygbh, FU_GETNL (T1.DACSRQ, T1.CSRQ, T1.NL) AS nl, t1.xb AS sex, t1.\"RANK\" AS zj, T1.RANKRQ AS zjrq, ( CASE WHEN T1.RANKRQ IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE TRUNC ( MONTHS_BETWEEN (SYSDATE, T1.RANKRQ) / 12 ) END ) AS zjnx, t1.CSRQ, t1.ZW AS dqzjxzw, T1.ZWRQ, ( CASE WHEN T1.ZWRQ IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE TRUNC ( MONTHS_BETWEEN (SYSDATE, T1.ZWRQ) / 12 ) END ) AS RZNX, FU_GETRZDQNL (T1.XB, T1.ZW) AS txnx, T1.CREATEMAN, T1.CREATEDATE, T1.UPDATEMAN, T1.UPDATEDATE, T1.GW, T1.ORMORGNAME, T1.ORMORGID as orgid, T1.ORMORGSECTORNAME, T1.ORMORGSECTORID as ORGSECTORID FROM T_PIMPERSON t1 WHERE t1.jlss = '10' AND t1.\"RANK\" IS NOT NULL) t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t2 on T1.zj = T2.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t3 on t1.dqzjxzw = t3.ormdutyid

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DQZJXZW`, t1.`GW`, t1.`NL`, t1.`NLDQ`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PCMRZGLID`, t1.`PCMRZGLNAME`, t1.`RZNX`, t1.`RZNX_COLOR`, t1.`SEX`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGID`, t1.`YGNAME`, t1.`ZJ`, t1.`ZJNX`, t1.`ZJNX_COLOR`, t1.`ZJRQ`, t1.`ZWRQ` FROM `T_PCMRZGL` t1
